bind.calculate: if(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd = '', '', concat(int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) + 1963, if(int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253 - (365 * int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) + 1 + int((int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) - 1) div 4))) div 30) + 1 < 10, '-0', '-'), int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253 - (365 * (int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) + 1963 - 1963) + 1 + int((int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) - 1) div 4))) div 30) + 1, if(((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253 - (365 * int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) + 1 + int((int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) - 1) div 4))) mod 30) + 1 < 10, '-0', '-'), ((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253 - (365 * int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) + 1 + int((int((date(/data/pregnancy_outcome/edd) - 253) div 365.25) - 1) div 4))) mod 30) + 1))

text.value: You are recording the pregnancy outcome for . Please complete this form if this client has given birth.
This is classified as a Spontaneous Abortion.
What is the outcome of 's pregnancy?
What is the outcome of 's pregnancy?
Year must be 2 digits and between 1999 and the current year
You have entered a year over 5 years in the past, please check to make sure you have entered the year correctly.
Follow closely in the maternity waiting room and/or active labor and give the required healthcare services. After she gives birth, reopen this form and complete it.
Which documents do you have about this delivery? Select all that apply
Integrated Antenatal, Labor, Delivery, Newborn, and Postnatal Care Card
The date cannot be in the future!
The outcome time cannot be in the future.
When was expected to give birth?
Route or on the way to the health center / hospital
Name of Midwife responsible for completing this form for the client:
What was the pregnancy outcome of the mother ?
Unstable or deteriorating and referred to next facility
Route or on the way to the health center / hospital
Route or on the way to the health post
Obstetric Complications. Select all that apply
You cannot select "None" and another option.
Do you have details for the baby(s)?
What was the outcome of baby?
Approximately how old was baby when he/she died?
Route or on the way to the health center / hospital
Route or on the way to the health post
What is name given to baby?
This value cannot be greater than 10.
This value cannot be greater than 10.
Weight must be between 1000 and 5000 grams.
was previously tested as HIV positive.
Mother and newborn referred to chronic care
It is too late for PNC visits for .
Are and/or baby(s) expected to remain at HC for longer than the normal 24 hour period?
Please be in contact with the HEW to let her know the ongoing status of her clients.

What is the PNC 1 date?
Earliest Time: **Now**
Latest Time: **** at ** (after sunrise)**

What is the PNC 1 date?
Earliest Time: **Now**
Latest Time: **** at ** (after sunrise)**
That date is not in the recommended range.

What is the PNC 1 date?
Earliest Time: **Now**
Latest Time: **** at ** (after sunset)**

What is the PNC 1 date?
Earliest Time: **Now**
Latest Time: **** at ** (after sunset)**
A notification will be sent to the HEW informing them to conduct a PNC Visit.
Follow the client list closely to ensure that the HEW has conducted the first PNC visit within 48 hours of delivery.

Form complete.
Select the green arrow in the top right corner to send the form.
የእርግዝና ውጤቱን ለታካሚ ጤና ኬላ የእመዘገብሽ ነው፡፡ እባክሽን፣ ይቺ ታካሚ ከወለደች በኃላ ይህ ቅፅ ሙሉ ለሙሉ ይላሞላ፡፡
የታካሚ ሜዲካል ሪከርድ ቁጥር (_ _ _ _ _/_ _). ባዶ ቦታው ላይ ይምሉ.
የሚመዘገበው ቁጥር ከ1-5 ዲጂት መሆን አለበት
ዓመት ባለ 2 ዲጂት እና በ1999 እና አሁን ያለው ዓመት መካከል መሆን አለበት
ማስገባት ከነበረብሽ 5ዓመት ወደ ኋላ ተመልሰሻል፣ እባክሽ ትክክለኛውን ዓመት ማስገባትሽ አረጋግጪ
መከተል በማዋለጃ ክፍል አከባቢ በመቀመጥ አስፈላጊውን የጤና እንክብካቤ ማድረግ. ከወለደች በኋላ ቅፁን እንደገና መክፈት እና ሞሙላት
ስለዚህ ወሊድ ሁኔታ የትኛው መረጃው ነው ያለሽ ፡፡ ሁሉንም መልስ ሊሆኑ የምችሉት ይመረጡ.
ሰዓት በ1 እና በ12 መካከል መሆን አለበት
ይህ የታካሚ ቅፅ ለሞሙላት ሃላፊነት ያለባት የአዋላጅ ባለሙያ ስም
የማዋለድ ህክምናው ከባድ የሆነበት ምክንያት የትኛው ነው .መልስ ሊሆኑ የሚችሉትን ሁሉንም ይምረጡ.
"ምንም" የሚለውን እና ሌሎች ምርጫዎችን በጋራ መምረጥ አይቻልም ፡፡
የማዋለድ ህክምናው ከባድ ከሆነ፣ ሪፈር ተደርጋለች
ብዙ ልጆች ከሆነ የወለደችው፣ በቁጥር ስንት ናቸው፡፡
ስል ልጁ ወይም ልጆቹ ዝርዝር መረጃዎች አሉሽ ?
የልጁ ውጤት ወይም የወሊድ ሁኔታ እንዴት ነው ?
ህፃኑ ሲሞት በግምት ዕድሜው ስንት ነበር?
ክብደቱ መሆን ያለበት በ1000 እና በ5000 ግራም መካከል ነው፡፡
የታካሚ 's የሜዲካል ሪከርድ ቁጥር(_ _ _ _ _/_ _). ባዶ ቦታው ላይ ይሙሉ.
የሚመዘገበው ቁጥር ከ1-5 ዲጂት መሆን አለበት
የህፃን ከዚህ በፊት የነበረው ኤች.አይ.ቪ ምርመራ ውጤት በሽታው እንዳለበት ያሳይ ነበር፡፡
ለእናትየዋ የተሰጠው ኤ.አር.ቪ ፕሮፊላክሲስ መድኃኒት አይነት
ለልጁ የተሰጠው ኤ.አር.ቪ ፕሮፊላክሲስ መድኃኒት አይነት
